knimeNode.name: Time Series between events
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts time series between events (represented as strings) in an apposite column.

fullDescription.intro: Extracts time series from the input table located between string "xxxx", where xxxx is the name of the event (for example "split").
fullDescription.option: Select the input column containing the name of the event where you to split the original time series.
Name of the events where to split the original time series.
Output table will be the one conatining data from this date
Name of colun containing timestamp data

ports.dataOut: Table containing the time series between event i and event i+1 and date as specified in dialog panel.
